resources.string:
Hello! Hemanshu Varma here from Hyderabad. 
 I'm a Android Developer and Tech Enthusiast. 
 I graduated from Malla Reddy Institute of Technology and Science in Computer Science Specialization. 
 I love to code in free hours and cuddle with pooches :P 
 The best thing about being in Hyderabad is the food and culture followed. :) 
 The most popular dish is Biryani and people all over India come here just to grab a bite of it.
